lexUnit.name: moan.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: utter or make a moan.

sentence.text: ` I am not a wart-hog from hell , " she moans .
` These friggin' , friggin' batteries , " she moaned .
` I feel seasick already ! " she moaned .
The ex-world champion moaned : ` I would n't advise any boys to take up the game .
Subsequently , two members of this team complained about their leader to a director : " He 's slowing us down , " they moaned .
` There is a curse on this place ! " she moaned .
` I 've got a sore foot , too , " he moaned .
And I shall miss 'er wages when she goes , " moaned Mum .
` I want one , " moaned Angalo , clenching his fists .
` Oh , no , " moaned Dick .
` Jarrett Keach , " moaned Felicity .
` La soupe , " moaned Auguste in despair , noticing the vast canister standing unheated on the floor .
` If only it were so , " moaned Neville .
` We need a miracle , a bloody miracle , " moaned Hankin .
` My husband moans that I 'm not as slim as when we first met "
My husband , who 's 41 , hates the fact that I smoke and moans that I eat too much .
People do not want to be led by someone moaning that the press is unfair .
The England football management has for years moaned that there are no longer any easy matches , and England 's cricketers learned this salutary lesson against Sri Lanka .
Another moaned that Johnny was a little slow putting his hand in pocket .
` It 's rather a change , actually , " he murmured , ` to find a woman who does n't pick at her food and moan about endless diets .
Passengers also moaned about cancelled and overcrowded coaches and the lack of services .
` Coleslaw ! " moaned Gurder ecstatically .
I loved him , " moaned Gwendolen defiantly .
` Why are you running away from me ? " moaned Mcduff looking hurt .
` He 's ruining everything ! " moaned Etty Moorhen sadly .
I 'M NOT a New Man ; I 'm a failed house-husband , " moans Walter in Graham Swannell 's self-directed two-hander .
When I got there they moaned about all the clothes and stuff I had , because you have to take everything with you when they move you about .
Second , MPs moan about the cramped conditions they work in .
Drinkers also moaned about dirt and smells in pubs , bad toilets and ` down-at-heel " gardens .
We can compare the growth of our peas and beans , and moan about the weather .
And they used to moan at each other : “ Your system sounds different from my system …
If he did n't turn up they moaned at him later for not being there , and they had used his name for fund-raising without permission .
` Ray 's always moaning at me to get in the box .
` Thomas , Thomas , " Gwendolen moaned quietly to herself , and made no further bid for the limelight .
We 'd been moaning to Malcolm about wanting to play some gigs .
` So do n't moan to me about your unhappy lot , Mama .
` Why ? " he moans to his shrink .
POOR Elizabeth Harris moans about being married to two millionaire stars , the late Rex Harrison and Richard Harris , and then to having to work for a living !
They just moan on and on about Fergie this and Fergie that … and I 've simply had enough .
“ I 've been moaning on about Perdita all evening , but at least she 's alive , whereas Will … ”
